title: Холостяки
overview: Friends Gosha, Tolya, Dmitry and Oleg are exemplary womanizers. Women for them are a measure of the ambitions of a man's wealth and self-confidence. Although both real passion and true feeling are not alien to them. In a series of endless romances, they can truly fall in love. True, the objects of their feelings sometimes turn out to be practically unattainable.
